file_content.text: Imperials are taking people for "testing" to the main lab. It's in the Red Light Sector--not sure exactly where.
That's one of the busiest parts of Nar Shaddaa. We'll never find the lab.
I've heard it's the only building with a dedicated energy reactor. Does that help?
Absolutely. Contact me when you're in the Red Light Sector. I'll have a plan. Rieekan out.
I'll get these volunteers to safety. I hope you kill every last one of those Imperials.
You'll be alright. I'm here to help.
Chief Rieekan? The recruitment center was overrun with Imperials.
No sign of Agent Galen, but I've just freed some refugees.
Not refugees--heroes. These people put their lives on the line for victory over the Empire.
Name's Vell Narroc. Been recruiting volunteers for the Power Guard project since it started.
Those people asked to become test subjects?
The Empire stole their homeworlds. They jumped at the chance for payback.
Over the years, hundreds of people volunteered for the Power Guard experiments. Heroes, all of them.
How many Power Guards are there? What are they like?
Tell me about these heroes.
That's way above my security level--but I've heard they're amazing. Even stronger than a Jedi.
How did Imperials get control?
I was organizing fresh recruits when Imperials stormed inside. They rounded us up, threw us in the cage.
They're called "experiments" because most end in failure.
And probably all dead.
People know the risk--but they're willing to try anyway.
Don't know how the Empire found us, but they control the whole project now.
A Republic agent named Galen came here. What happened to him?
They got my ally.
They captured him alive. Their leader wanted him.
Tell me where the Power Guard experiments take place.
I need to find the main lab.
Never seen the main lab, but it's someplace in the Red Light Sector. Imperials are sending people there for "testing."
I don't care how many Imperials I have to kill--they're not getting away with this.
Not for long.
Then you'd better hurry.
The Imperials were going to kill us. They deserved what you did.
